titleStmt.title: The maner to dye well An introduction most compendiouslie shewinge the fruytfull remembrance of the last fowre things: that is to say, death, hel, iudgement, and the ioyes of heauen. Gathered out of manye good authors, both comfortable and profitable to the dilligent reader. Learnedly instructing howe to prouide for death.
titleStmt.author: Soto, Pedro de, d. 1563. aut
W. B.

notesStmt.note: Includes, with caption title: The maner howe to dye well. Written in Latine by Pedro de Soto.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
